```{r setup}
library(spiderorchid)
library(dplyr)
```

# Total output for 2024

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# Grab output from ORCID where possible
orcid <- staff_ids |>
  pull(orcid_id) |>
  na.omit() |>
  fetch_orcid() |>
  filter(year == 2024)
# Otherwise grab output from Scholar
scholar <- staff_ids |>
  filter(is.na(orcid_id)) |>
  pull(scholar_id) |>
  na.omit() |>
  fetch_scholar() |>
  filter(year == 2024)
```
